```{r setup, echo = TRUE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(broom)

# Spatial data packages
library(sf) # sf is simple features 
library(tmap)
library(rnaturalearth) # geographic data, change returnclass to sf 
```





```{r}
world <- ne_countries(scale = "medium", returnclass = "sf")

merged_data <- merge(world, active_country_dates_clean, by.x = "name_long", by.y = "country")

ggplot() +
  geom_sf(data = world, fill = "lightgrey", color = "white") +
  geom_sf(data = merged_data, aes(fill = "blue"), color = "white") +
 scale_fill_manual(values = c("blue" = "blue", "lightgrey" = "lightgrey"), guide = "none") +
  theme_void()
```
